products.title: Pure White Real Wood
products.description: Ourpremium quality sunwood range ofblinds are one of the leading wooden venetian blind brands in the uk market - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail. The pure white sunwood blinds offer a sheer elegance, due to their natural beauty.

products.title: Gloss Pure White Real Wood
products.description: Ourpremiumquality sunwood range ofblinds are one of the leading wooden venetian blind brands in the uk market - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail. With a contemporary white glossy finish, the gloss collection gives an edge of high drama and sophistication.

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.
